results.title: Cardiac Inflammation after Ischemia-Reperfusion of the Kidney: Role of the Sympathetic Nervous System and the Renin-Angiotensin System.
results.text_hl: @GENE_NPPA @GENE_230899 @@@ANF@@@, a marker of @DISEASE_Heart_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D006331 @@@cardiac lesion@@@, increased after @DISEASE_Glycosuria_Renal @DISEASE_MESH:D006030 @@@renal@@@ I/@<m>DISEASE_Ring_Chromosome_20_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C580424 @@@R@@@, the values being restored to the level of Sham group after @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ or @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@ treatment.

citations.NLM: Panico K, Abrahão MV, Trentin-Sonoda M, Muzi-Filho H, Vieyra A, Carneiro-Ramos MS. Cardiac Inflammation after Ischemia-Reperfusion of the Kidney: Role of the Sympathetic Nervous System and the Renin-Angiotensin System. Cell Physiol Biochem. 2019;53(4):587-605. PMID: 31535830
